If you read it, You would have known it was a joke and nothing more.  
I won't post any more jokes ok. 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
> I hope that Polish thing was really a joke because I really dont 
like 
> virus'....
> 
>     Hell Beast, followed by Gremlin, made there way up to the 
Predacon ship 
> and were surprized to find it still in good condition. The sheilds 
were 
> raised, and autoguns armed. With the freash scourch marks on the 
hull it 
> seems there might have been a rescent battle.
>     "Now this is where i take command of my former troops. Watch 
and you 
> might lern something, Major Gremlin." Hell Beast gloated as he 
reached his 
> comm unit, "This is Predacon Senetor and Commander Hell Beast. I 
have 
> returned to retake command of the Predacon forces. Open the hatch 
now! Thats 
> an order!" He barked.
>     
>     Aracnia slapped herself on the head. First Megatron and now 
Hell Beast. 
> And Hell Beast was going to take command. "Alright, let him in. 
Quickstrike, 
> go to the hatch and meet him there. The rest of you finish up 
cleaning and 
> hurry! Darkmouse, you go and scout out where Megatron is hiding, 
then radio 
> us back so we can get Inferno. Hurry!" She said picking up debris 
along with 
> Rampage, Tarantulas, Aerostreak, and Paralysis.
> 
>     Megatron, Aquarious, Paddle Tail, Night Eyes, and an 
unconscience 
> Inferno, and hopefully Terrorsaur made it to the cave. They entered 
easil and 
> found Waspinator reclining on the Command Chair enjoying himself.
>     "Trechorous bug! You left me to die!" He snapped at the bot. 
Waspinator 
> spun around and dropped to his knees.
>     "Megatron! Slug bot said you were dead! He went to go and 
salvage some 
> parts from the transport." Waspinator said in his annoying bug 
voice.
>     The tyrant sa on the command chair and turned to the 
monitors, "Well, 
> this is our place now. And with Inferno we can now commence the 
cloning. It 
> will take awhile....but with the clones we will dominate the Beast 
Wars once 
> and for all!"
